extension.summary: No scrolling. No deciding. Just watching.
extension.description: Tired of scrolling through your library wondering what to watch? EasyTV handles it. It tracks your shows and always knows your next episode. When you're ready for something new, it'll suggest a show you haven't started. Throw in some movies if you want. Just sit down, press play, and enjoy. Built for Kodi 21+.
extension.news: v1.2.0 (2026-01-21) - New: Episode duration filter for shows - New: Both mode lazy queue (dynamic playlist) - Performance: Duration cache reduces startup by ~7-8 seconds - Fixed: Library scan refresh, selector sorting, clone issues - See changelog.txt for full details
